item.title: 贝森特表示美国不会单方面提出削减对华关税
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统尚未提出单方面降低美国对中国的关税。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that President Donald Trump hasn’t offered to take down US tariffs on China on a unilateral basis.】

item.title: 丘博首席执行官呼吁美国政策保持一致以避免关税混乱
item.description: 丘博有限公司（Chubb Ltd.首席执行官埃文-格林伯格（Evan Greenberg）呼吁 "政策的连贯性"，以消除唐纳德-特朗普总统在贸易问题上的困惑，并表示可预测性对于经济增长至关重要。【原文：Chubb Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Evan Greenberg called for a “coherence of policy” to dispel confusion around President Donald Trump’s approach to trade, saying predictability is essential for economic growth.】

item.title: 贸易保护主义集团使巴拉圭免受特朗普关税之苦
item.description: 巴拉圭财政部长在接受采访时说，加入世界上保护主义最严重的贸易集团之一将有助于巴拉圭免受美国关税造成的最严重的短期干扰。【原文：Membership in one of the world’s most protectionist trade blocs will help shield Paraguay from the worst of near-term disruptions caused by US tariffs, the country’s finance chief said in an interview.】

item.title: 美国司法部因竞争问题调查迪士尼与 FuboTV 的交易
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，美国司法部的反垄断官员正在调查华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：Antitrust officials at the US Justice Department are looking into Walt Disney Co.’s deal to take a controlling stake in streaming company FuboTV Inc., according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: Meta's Threads 将在全球 30 个市场投放广告
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司将向全球几乎所有广告商开放其 Threads 社交网络，通过让品牌接触包括美国在内的 30 个市场的用户，为公司创造新的收入来源。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will open its Threads social network to almost all advertisers globally, creating a new line of revenue for the company by giving brands access to users across 30 markets, including the US.】

item.title: 美元和国债获得欧洲的信任票
item.description: 美元和美国国债得到了欧盟前两大经济体主要财政部长的口头支持。【原文：The dollar and US Treasuries got verbal support from key finance chiefs of the European Union’s top two economies.】

item.title: AQR 押注机器学习，Cliff Asness 成为人工智能信徒
item.description: 克利夫-阿斯内斯（Cliff Asness）是华尔街传统量化金融的标杆人物，他曾一度怀疑机器学习能否在 AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）大放异彩。【原文：Cliff Asness, Wall Street’s standard bearer of traditional quant finance, was once skeptical that machine learning would ever make a big splash at AQR Capital Management.】

item.title: 今天是贝森特日，股市上涨
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，美国信贷风险两周来降幅最大
item.description: 自两周前美国首次宣布对数十个国家暂停征收 90 天关税以来，衡量美国企业信贷风险的指标在周三出现了最大程度的放松。【原文：Gauges of perceived US corporate credit risk eased the most on Wednesday since the US first announced a 90-day tariff pause for dozens of countries two weeks ago.】

item.title: 拜耳高层投资者要求制定计划结束长期危机
item.description: 两位德国知名投资者对拜耳股份公司一再陷入困境表示愤慨，要求在周五举行的年度股东大会之前，为这家企业集团的危机找到一条更清晰的出路。【原文：Two prominent German investors voiced exasperation over Bayer AG’s recurring struggles, demanding a clearer path out of the conglomerate’s crises ahead of the annual shareholder meeting on Friday.】

item.title: 美国国债真的失去避险吸引力了吗？须知
item.description: 投资者通常把美国国债作为避开金融市场动荡的避风港。在全球金融危机期间、911事件中，甚至在美国自身信用评级被下调时，美国国债都出现了反弹。【原文：Investors typically flock to US Treasury bonds as a haven from gyrations in financial markets. They rallied during the global financial crisis, on 9/11 and even when America’s own credit rating was cut.】

item.title: 纽约市门户隧道预计将为经济带来 4450 亿美元的收益
item.description: 人们期待已久的连接纽约市和新泽西州的铁路隧道项目耗资 160 亿美元，预计将为国家和地区经济带来 4 450 亿美元的增长。【原文：The long-awaited $16 billion rail tunnel project connecting New York City and New Jersey is expected to provide the national and regional economy with a $445 billion boost.】

item.title: 吉宾斯的对冲基金飙升 54% 后，他将再次动用外部现金
item.description: 对冲基金经理罗伯特-吉宾斯（Robert Gibbins）曾在多年亏损后于 2022 年归还了客户的资金，在他的宏观对冲基金通过改革策略取得两位数收益后，他正寻求再次筹集外部资金。【原文：Hedge fund manager Robert Gibbins, who returned clients’ capital in 2022 following years of losses, is looking to raise external money again after his revamped strategy produced double-digit gains for his macro hedge fund.】

item.title: 高盛赢得股东关于 8000 万美元高管奖金的投票
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. ）的高管薪酬提案赢得了大多数股东的支持，尽管有批评称其奖金过高，这缓解了人们对该公司在与收购公司竞争时为留住顶尖人才所做努力的担忧。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s executive pay proposal won majority support from shareholders despite criticism the bonuses were excessive, easing concerns over the firm’s push to retain top talent as it competes with buyout firms.】

item.title: 美国新房销售量因南部地区激增而超出预期
item.description: 上个月，美国新房销售量猛增，原因是房贷利率出现了可喜的下降，而且销售激励措施持续不断，从而拉开了春季销售旺季的序幕。【原文：Sales of new homes in the US jumped last month on a welcome dip in mortgage rates and ongoing sales incentives to kick off the crucial spring selling season.】

item.title: Bradesco 说：拉丁美洲是市场的主宰，而不是特朗普
item.description: Bradesco BBI 股票策略主管本-莱德勒（Ben Laidler）认为，与唐纳德-特朗普的关税战相比，拉美股票的前景更多地取决于地方选举以及财政和货币政策。【原文：The outlook for Latin American shares depends more on local elections and fiscal and monetary policy than it does Donald Trump’s tariff war, according to Ben Laidler, Bradesco BBI’s head of equity strategy.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国支持国际货币基金组织和世界银行，同时呼吁改革
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）说，国际货币基金组织和世界银行发挥着 "关键作用"，特朗普政府愿意与它们合作，但同时也表示，它们一直没有完成自己的核心使命。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that the International Monetary Fund and World Bank serve “critical roles,” and that the Trump administration is willing to work with them, while saying that they have been falling short of their core missions.】

item.title: Roku 推出更小的流媒体棒和新型安全摄像头
item.description: 广受欢迎的流媒体电视产品制造商 Roku 公司推出了升级版操作系统、一对流媒体棒、新款电视机和家用安全摄像机。【原文：Roku Inc., the maker of popular streaming-TV products, rolled out an upgraded operating system, a pair of streaming sticks, new TV sets and home security cameras.】

item.title: 亚特兰大联储将利用黄金调整模型更新 GDPNow
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行正在更新其广受关注的 GDPNow 预测，新模型对黄金进口进行了调整，而黄金进口最近扭曲了对经济增长的估计。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta is updating its widely followed GDPNow forecast with a new model that adjusts for gold imports, which have recently distorted growth estimates.】

item.title: 特朗普关税和美联储担忧缓解，美国国债反弹
item.description: 周三，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他并不倾向于解雇美联储主席，并暗示对中国进口商品征收的关税可能会下降，在以美元计价的风险资产广泛反弹的背景下，长期国债收益率下跌。【原文：Long-maturity Treasury yields tumbled Wednesday as part of a broader rally in dollar-denominated risk assets, after US President Donald Trump said he wasn’t inclined to fire the head of the Federal Reserve and suggested tariffs on Chinese imports could drop.】

item.title: 康托尔将在 Tether 和软银的支持下成立加密货币公司
item.description: Cantor Fitzgerald 正在与 Tether Holdings SA 和软银集团联手创建一家名为 Twenty One Capital Inc.【原文：Cantor Fitzgerald is teaming up with Tether Holdings SA and SoftBank Group to create a new company called Twenty One Capital Inc., with the goal of accumulating Bitcoin.】

item.title: 受关税影响，美国商业活动增长为 2023 年以来最弱
item.description: 美国商业活动以 2023 年以来最慢的速度扩张，同时产出预期恶化，价格压力增大，关税问题令企业头疼。【原文：US business activity expanded at the slowest pace since 2023, while output expectations deteriorated and price pressures mounted as tariffs created headaches for companies.】

item.title: 考虑下调中国关税，S&P 500 指数大涨近 3
item.description: 据报道，白宫考虑削减对中国的关税，而且唐纳德-特朗普总统表示不打算解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔，美国股市继续反弹。【原文：US stocks continued to rally as the White House reportedly considers slashing tariffs on China and President Donald Trump said he doesn’t plan to fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 法国以和解姿态化解特朗普贸易紧张局势
item.description: 法国财政部长表示，他同意美国政府对全球商业的分析，并呼吁建立 "双赢 "的跨大西洋伙伴关系。【原文：France softened its approach to the trade clash with Donald Trump as the country’s finance chief said he agreed with the US administration’s analysis of global commerce and called for a “win-win” transatlantic partnership.】

item.title: 匈牙利化肥大亨深陷债权人纠纷
item.description: 匈牙利化肥生产商 Nitrogenmuvek Zrt 的所有者 Laszlo Bige 在与债权人就延长其债券即将到期日的问题僵持不下时，排除了使用有形资产作为抵押的可能性。【原文：Laszlo Bige, the owner of Hungarian fertilizer maker Nitrogenmuvek Zrt, ruled out using tangible assets as collateral in a standoff with creditors over extending a looming maturity date for its bonds.】

item.title: 马斯洛夫斯卡预计，如果CPI疲软，波兰将于5月降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 波兰货币政策委员会政策制定者加布里埃拉-马斯洛夫斯卡（Gabriela Maslowska）表示，如果 4 月份的通胀数据持续疲软，该委员会可能会在下个月将基准利率下调 25 个基点。【原文：Poland’s Monetary Policy Council may reduce its benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points next month if April’s inflation readout stays soft, according to policymaker Gabriela Maslowska.】

item.title: 欧洲垃圾债券市场重开，数周来首次发行债券
item.description: 在经历了数周关税引发的波动之后，欧洲垃圾债券市场重新开市，这是自 4 月初以来的首次发行。【原文：Europe’s junk bond market has reopened with its first offering since early April, following weeks of tariff-induced volatility.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）警告经济增长疲软将导致新一轮全球债务激增
item.description: 国际货币基金组织警告说，由于美国引发的贸易紧张局势导致经济增长放缓和金融市场更加动荡，今年全球公共借贷可能会激增。【原文：The International Monetary Fund warned that global public borrowing will likely surge this year as trade tensions triggered by the US lead to slower economic growth and more volatility on financial markets.】

item.title: 英国央行首席经济学家质疑量化宽松是应对危机的 "大锤
item.description: 英国央行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）对过去危机中量化宽松政策被用作 "大锤 "的方式提出了质疑，一天前，他的一位同事说央行今后应采取更有针对性和更有分寸的方法。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill has raised doubts over the way quantitative easing was used as a “sledgehammer” during past crises, a day after one of his colleagues said the central bank should take a more targeted and measured approach in future.】

item.title: 美国食品及药物管理局要求提供更多有关其 Covid 疫苗的数据后，Novavax 大幅上涨
item.description: 尽管美国卫生与公众服务部部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Novavax Inc. shares rose after US regulators asked for more data on its Covid vaccine, signaling the shot may be on a path to full approval despite US Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. raising doubts about its efficacy.】
